Key Match Events: Tanzid Hasan dismissed Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav in the space of three balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India made 196 runs, a par-plus total
Hardik Pandya had a solid outing with the ball
Melinda Farrell reported a party atmosphere at the stadium
Najmul Hossain Shanto, the Bangladesh captain, was finding the boundary easier than his team-mates
Others: The game was played at North Sound, Antigua
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
